1608920.name: The Exclusion Zone Online
1608920.description:
A multiplayer survival horror game with a first-person view and RPG elements.

Events are unfolding these days in a closed infected area, which is not so easy to find on a regular map. The usual laws do not apply here, there are no police and law enforcement agencies — therefore, the zone attracts people who want to escape justice. And various anomalies and their creations attract scientists, mercenaries, eager for profit, and ordinary stalkers.

There are no character leveling restrictions in the game. Players decide for themselves who they want to become: a technician, a medic, a military man, a merchant, or develop in a versatile way. In parallel with the experience set, the character will receive achievements that give additional bonuses to health, strength, endurance, intelligence and more. Players can form groups and capture territories that will bring them a tactical advantage and financial profit.
1608920.supported_languages:
英语, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
